    3D Hexagonal primitive with a 2-site hcp basis.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LatticeHcp

        public LatticeHcp​(Space space)
        Hexagonal hcp crystal with a lattice constant that gives a maximum-density structure for spheres of unit.

        Use scaleBy method if desired to make lattice constant give maximum density for another sphere size.

      • LatticeHcp

        public LatticeHcp​(Space space,
                  double latticeConstant)

    • Method Detail

      • scaleBy

        public void scaleBy​(double scaleFactor)
        Rescales the lattice by the given factor. Multiplies the lattice constants by the given value.
